name: Banana Bonez
description:
Get ready to go bananas with Banana Bonez, a hilarious strategy game where you lead a team of monkey paleontologists to the center of the Earth (3000 km)! Dig for precious bones, clean them up, assess their value, and sell them to make a profit. But watch out for the skeletons and zombies trying to stop you! Upgrade your team's efficiency and defense to dig deeper and find even more valuable artifacts.

Tutorial:

You have four monkeys on your team: a digger, a scientist, a clerk, and a defender.

  1. Click on the digger monkey repeatedly until it reaches the first bone. This will start the cycle where the scientist cleans the bones, and the clerk sells them.
  2. Use the money you earn to perform upgrades. This automates and speeds up the process. Upgrade your team members, and invest in your defense to protect the research center from zombies and skeletons.
  3. Scroll up and down with your mouse wheel to get to your digger!
  4. Reach the center of the Earth (3000 km) to win!

Developer: Casuology

Music: Setuniman of freesound.org
